I20050426-1700

I got "java.io.IOException: channel is not opened." in my .log. Sorry no steps.
See also bug 90766.

Unfortunately, the stacktrace from the original exception was lost (since 
IOExceptions don't have a payload and we need to pass the error through the 
connection API as an IOException). I have added code to log the original 
exception. 

Marking as REMIND. Please reopen if you see this again add include any 
additonal logged exceptions.
We now get this very frequently on our Linux build machine. Log follows...

Created an attachment (id=20986)
Dialog that comes after synchronizing

I have not been able to reproduce this but based on the exception I have 
updated to losed connection handling to retry in this case. Please reopen if 
the problem persists.
